verses.name: 1 Kings 7:33
verses.text: And the work of the wheels was like the work of a chariot wheel: their axletrees, and their naves, and their felloes, and their spokes, were all molten.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:34
verses.text: And there were four undersetters to the four corners of one base: and the undersetters were of the very base itself.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:35
verses.text: And in the top of the base was there a round compass of half a cubit high: and on the top of the base the ledges thereof and the borders thereof were of the same.
